english.segment2: If I'm here all alone, if I'm left behind. If they spit in my face, if they hate my kind. I will rise above, I will live for love, I will answer the call. For the bond between, for the depth unseen, For my God forsake it all.
english.segment4: 'Cause I'm a fire, I'm a flood, I'm a revolution
english.segment6: When, the world is at war, when the grace is gone, when the hungry lay dead, while the rich live on, I will rise above, I will live for love, I will answer the call.
english.segment8: For the bond between, for a depth unseen, for my God forsake it all, (Here I stand), open hands, waiting for you, I won't back down, I'll. live to speak Your truth
